channel.title: C4d
channel.description: well, im thinking about aquiring c4d because of all the cool things ive seen people do with it. so i just wanted some info on it like how to use it and stuff. links to tuts maybe.

Not enough to make a competition for
[/quote]

Exe dropped it before.

item.title: C4d
item.dc:creator: @archerer98 Archer
item.description:
@archerer98 wrote:

[quote=“Mr.Chris, post:36, topic:145879”][quote author=FastBawlz link=topic=199738.msg1780585#msg1780585 date=1190770723]

We should have a competition.
Like, you get a few days, and a set subject, and you have to model it, texture, and render it before the deadline.

Winner will be decided by topology, and quality, detail type stuff. Have a poll or something.

To few people that have C4D, if we get more then I will check with… people…
[/quote]

A few days? A week, more like

I think this is a good idea. Gives me a chance to put what I’ve learnt to the test ;)[/quote]

Yea I think its a good idea.

Read full topic

item.title: C4d
item.dc:creator: @SomethingToHide STH
item.description:
@SomethingToHide wrote:

[quote=“Mr.Chris, post:23, topic:145879”][quote]ROFL.
Thank you for the compliment.

I’m not trying to brag, or sound conceited, or knock anyone else’s work, but…
That’s kinda true.
If you guys think everything everyone else does with it is cool (I can’t think of anything “exceptional” in my mind), then you have some low expectations. Which doesn’t seem the case, because every signature around here that I think is good gets torn to peices by people saying it doesn’t flow and whatnot. You guys have very high expectations on that shit.
[/quote]

QFT.

It went You > Me > FastBawlz > *. I copied you, then FastBawlz had to have that ‘I’m better than you’ feeling, so he copied me, then the rest of the community went nuts about C4D.

But C4D work I’ve started, recently, to take on seriously. I’ve spent a few hundred dollars on DVDs, Magazines, Books, just to get ‘ok’ at it :P[/quote]

Yeah man, I’ve been doing this for years. So I just have tons of knowledge built up.

Read full topic
